attributes.action: Set up a Select Committee for Safeguarding Adults with learning disabilities.
attributes.additional_details: There is something very wrong with the work practice services for Safeguarding Adults with learning disabilities which need investigating.
attributes.background: There is no precedent, point of law or Parliamentary Select Committee fit for purpose regarding Safeguarding Adults with learning disabilities.

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action, and we're not sure exactly what remit you would like this new Committee to have.

You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.
